charges.charge_description: 21:952(a), 960(a)(1) &; 960(b)(2)(A); 18:3551 et seq-IMPORTATION OF HEROIN, A SCH I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Judgment including sentence under the sentencing reform act dtd. 12/1/93 by Judge Hurley that the deft plead guilty to ct 1 of the indictment. Remaining counts are dismissed on motion of the US. It is ordered that the deft shall pay to the US a special assessment of $50.00. Deft is hereby committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 30 months. Upon release from imprisonment, deft shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 years. Deft shall not possess a firearm. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(B)(i); 18:3551 et seq-POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE HEROIN, A SCH I NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (2)

21:952(a) and 960-Defendant did knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully import into the United States from a place outside thereof a substance containing heroin, Schedule I narcotic drug controlled substance. [1:93-m-853]
